files.README.md:
# Parslee AI - Claude Code Plugins

Official marketplace for Parslee AI's Claude Code plugins.

## Available Plugins

### Neo - Semantic Reasoning Helper

Multi-agent semantic reasoning system with persistent memory for code suggestions, architectural guidance, and optimization recommendations.

**Features:**
- Multi-agent collaboration (Solver, Critic, Verifier)
- Persistent semantic memory that learns from experience
- Confidence scoring for all suggestions
- Pattern recognition and reusability
- Matrix-inspired personality that evolves with learning

## Installation

Add the Parslee AI marketplace:

```bash
/plugin marketplace add Parslee-ai/claude-code-plugins
```

Then install Neo:

```bash
/plugin install neo
```

## Usage

Once installed, you can use Neo through:

### Slash Commands

```bash
/neo How should I structure my authentication system?
/neo-review src/api/handlers.py
/neo-optimize process_data function
/neo-architect Should I use microservices or monolith?
/neo-debug Race condition in task processor
/neo-pattern repository pattern implementation
```

### Neo Agent

```
Use the Neo agent to analyze this code for performance bottlenecks.
```

## Documentation

- [Neo README](https://github.com/Parslee-ai/neo/blob/main/README.md)
- [Installation Guide](https://github.com/Parslee-ai/neo/blob/main/INSTALL.md)
- [Plugin Documentation](https://github.com/Parslee-ai/neo/blob/main/.claude-plugin/README.md)

## Contributing

To contribute to Neo or suggest new plugins for this marketplace:

- Neo contributions: [Parslee-ai/neo](https://github.com/Parslee-ai/neo)
- Marketplace suggestions: Open an issue in this repository

## License

Plugins in this marketplace are individually licensed. See each plugin's repository for license details.

- Neo: [MIT License](https://github.com/Parslee-ai/neo/blob/main/LICENSE)
